description:
All course examples are coded and tested under PHP5.

We GUARANTEE all course example codes will work perfectly under PHP5.


This course is developed by OnlyKiosk and belongs to the black belt level.

In this course, you will learn four graphic techniques and build four apps that can be installed onto your dynamic website immediately.

  1. The four techniques are:
  2. how to create a verification code,
  3. how to add watermark to a picture,
  4. how to crop a picture and how to scale down a picture to make a thumbnail.

The goal of this course is to enable you to code the four apps all by yourself.

You will learn what kind of functions you will need and how to use those functions.

You will also learn how to design those apps and most importantly, how to code the four apps by yourself.

This course is more than a demonstration of how to create those four apps, our goal is to enable you to create those four apps all by yourself so that you can create the app that fits your demand the best.
title: PHP Graphic Techniques: CAPTCHA/ Create a verification code
